importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: The date of the game that forced a Game 7 in the ALCS, marking a pivotal moment in the postseason.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The period during which the Blue Jays and Mariners played through Game 6, culminating in a decisive win that forced a Game 7.

keyTakeAways: Vladimir Guerrero Jr. hit his sixth home run in the postseason, extending the Blue Jays' lead to 5-0 and sealing a 6-2 victory over the Seattle Mariners.
The Blue Jays' win forced a decisive Game 7 in the American League Championship Series, their first such game since 1985.
Seattle Mariners committed three errors, including two in the second inning, which allowed runs and contributed to the Blue Jays' early advantage.
Randy Arozerana and Trey Yesavage played key defensive roles, with Yesavage throwing a season-high 31 splitters and recording three double plays.
The Mariners’ first Game 7 in franchise history will occur in Toronto, marking a historic moment for the team.
The winner of the ALCS will face the Los Angeles Dodgers in the World Series, with Game 1 scheduled for Friday.

namedEntities.name: Seattle Mariners
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: They lost to the Blue Jays in Game 6, committing three errors and scoring only one run, and will face a Game 7 for the first time in franchise history.

summaryOfNewsArticle: Vladimir Guerrero Jr. hit his sixth home run of the 2025 postseason, helping the Toronto Blue Jays defeat the Seattle Mariners 6-2 to force a Game 7 in the American League Championship Series. The Blue Jays, who have not won a pennant in over three decades, advanced to the World Series, where they will face the Los Angeles Dodgers. The Mariners' season-high three errors—two in the second inning—led to early runs, but they were unable to recover, with a wild pitch from Matt Brash sealing the game. This marks the first Game 7 in Seattle’s history and the second in the Blue Jays' franchise since 1985.
title: Vladimir Guerrero Jr. hits sixth homer of postseason as Blue Jays dominate Mariners to force ALCS Game 7
